FwkSenCnt.MEANING: impressive in beauty, scale, dignity, etc

ExCnt.EX: Located on the western coast of Thailand, it is home to majestic mountains and rainforests and some pristine beaches.
Experience a different safari everyday in the majestic beauty of Kenya, combining Indian Ocean beaches with a safari experience.
Reindeers are majestic animals and form an important part of wild life in Scotland.
Falconry - The Falcon is one of the most majestic and skilled of our natural hunters.
